title: Table Cover, 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, silk foundation, cotton lining 
Technique: cross and double running stitches on gauze weave foundation; satin weave lining
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Chinese characters and ornament embroidered in color on cream-colored gauze.  Bound with flowered ribbon edged with satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Table Cover, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: silk embroidery, silk foundation, cotton lining 
Technique: cross and double running stitches on gauze weave foundation; satin weave lining. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-234.
